testcase.name: test_send_test_reminder_without_sendgrid
testcase.failure: tests/test_admin_articles_email.py:363: in test_send_test_reminder_without_sendgrid assert response.status_code == 503, f"Expected 503 (service unavailable), got {response.status_code}: {response.text}" E AssertionError: Expected 503 (service unavailable), got 520: {"detail":"Email service not configured. Please add SENDGRID_API_KEY to enable email reminders."} E assert 520 == 503 E + where 520 = <Response [520]>.status_code
